author: andreasmyth
msg: Added abstract base class from which components can derive their configuration.
Extended Configuration interface with convenience accessors to obtain values for configuration items of the standard types (currently: boolean, int, long, double, string stringList).

AbstractConfigurationImpl implements hierarchical lookup however this will not be used as long as a component obtains its configuration exclusively from the defaults specified in its configuration meta data model(which is all we will support for MS2).
Converted ConfigurationException into an unchecked exception.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Added easymock class extension jar to eclipse user library EASYMOCK

author: eglynn
msg: * I18n'd all SEVERE & WARNING log messages
* Added EasyMock class extension and cglib to tools
